meanings.definition: Lasting or intended to last indefinitely.
meanings.sent1: The marker left a permanent mark on the whiteboard.
meanings.sent2: The sun's rays caused permanent damage to the skin.
meanings.sent3: The permanent marker refused to wash off, much to the teacher's dismay.
meanings.sent4: Her smile left a permanent impression on his heart.
meanings.sent5: The majestic mountain range stood as a permanent fixture in the landscape.

meanings.definition: A hairstyle involving the use of chemicals to set the hair in a particular style.
meanings.sent1: She got a new permanent at the salon for her birthday.
meanings.sent2: The actress's permanent was styled in elegant curls for the red carpet event.
meanings.sent3: The clown's permanent was so big, it seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: Her permanent was like a crown of curls framing her face.
meanings.sent5: The singer's permanent added volume and bounce to her hair.
